imageupdate
Class ImageUpdateThread

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.lang.Thread
        |
        +--imageupdate.ImageUpdateThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ImageUpdateThread
extends java.lang.Thread

This thread class loops infinitely asking the server for new images.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Bjorn Husberg and Louise Tysk

          The client that executed this thread

          boolean to tell that this object is done

          booelan to tell that someone has asked this object to pause
